As young adults it is nauseating how our Facebook feeds have begun to fill with an everincreasing number of engagement photos PERIOD

Interestingly happily ever after is happening less and less PERIOD According to the American Psychological Association between  to  percent of married couples divorce PERIOD

Conservative legislators in some states want to abolish nofault divorce PERIOD Nofault divorce allows a couple to end their marriage without either party committing an offense such as adultery or domestic violence PERIOD Simply falling out of love and unhappiness are enough reason for a nofault divorce PERIOD

A Washington Post article describes legislation threatening nofault divorce in Oklahoma Iowa and New Hampshire PERIOD It states In Oklahoma lawmakers are also considering a bill that would virtually prohibit nofault divorce but preserve divorce as an option in cases of impotency. current law in Virginia states that a nofault divorce can be awarded if the husband and wife have been living apart and independent of one another for atleastone year according to the Virginia State Bar PERIOD In certain cases a nofault divorce will be granted in six months PERIOD

This backwards legislation is alarming PERIOD Its imperative that nofault divorce remains untouched for future generations in the United States PERIOD

Shouldnt we have the choice to end our future marriages because we envisioned more from I do

The same Washington Post article highlights the achievements of nofault divorce PERIOD Since it was enacted Domestic violence dropped by a third in just  years the number of husbands convicted of murdering their wives fell by  percent and the number of women committing suicide declined between  and  percent. if couples are unable to set their problems aside and are unable to divorce the rate of spousal abuse adultery and other deplorable acts could rise as a result PERIOD

Nofault divorce must also remain intact so a couple can coparent in the best possible situation PERIOD Its unhealthy to raise a child in a home where the parents are in a neverending fight PERIOD

According to an ABC News article exposing a child to harsh parental fights heightens the risk of developing depression anxiety hostility and aggression PERIOD

The well being of children must be considered above all and if divorce is necessary to provide a nurturing environment that route should be taken PERIOD

Its admirable for legislators to protect the institution of marriage and its also understandable to urge couples to work out their differences before pulling the plug on their relationship PERIOD

However these legislators must remember that its  PERIOD If nofault marriage is eliminated in certain states it simply erases breakthroughs made to better the lives of American citizens PERIOD

Its time for conservatives to flee our bedrooms and focus on more modern ideals PERIOD
